title: Multiple Return Values (Challenge)
description: In Go, functions can return multiple values. This feature is commonly used to return both a result and an error value from a function.

meta.title: Mastering Multiple Return Values in Go
meta.description: Explore the power of multiple return values in Go programming, a versatile feature for handling results and errors.
meta.keywords: Go programming, multiple return values, function, error handling, programming tutorial
